heading: Choose a doctor
description: We have experts who can give you the right advice. All you need to do is choose one from our panel of experts as per your convinience.

heading: Find available dates
description: Choose a date which suits you the best

heading: Book an appointment
description: You can choose an appointment which is convenient for you

heading: Attend the appointment
description: Visit the hospital to finish your appointment. Your prescriptions can be viewed online from your account.
